definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
sb with whom one is on familiar terms/sb from the same place (same house, same town etc)/one of us

sentences.english: Bell sitting on his roof, sings delightedly.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔坐在自家屋顶上乐滋滋地唱歌。

sentences.english: Someone had changed the password and locked him out of his own e-mail system.
sentences.chinese: 有人修改了密码，将他挡在了自家的邮件系统之外。

sentences.english: He did not mention it even in the bosom of his family.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至在自家人中也未提及此事。

sentences.english: And that, his father and I sat by the side of his private Diaojiao house and chatted over tea.
sentences.chinese: 他阿爸拉我在自家的吊脚楼前边聊边喝茶。

sentences.english: You feel you can't walk around naked in your own flat.
sentences.chinese: 你发觉即便是在自家房子里也不能光着膀子走。

sentences.english: Paint a parking space in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 在自家客厅用油漆画一个停车位。

sentences.english: Contact so long, he know quick son to take good care of people of the same group.
sentences.chinese: 接触了这么久，他是知道敏儿对自家人的爱护的。

sentences.english: OnceWant to fire up your meals with home-grown chilis, they homegrown chilies?
sentences.chinese: 想要在你的日常饮食中吃上自家种植的辣椒吗？

sentences.english: Others, who prefer convenience and privacy, set up fitness equipment in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 那些喜欢方便和隐私的人则自家购置了健身器材。

sentences.english: He grew rice and other produce, which were mostly needed for family consumption.
sentences.chinese: 他种稻子和其它农产品，主要用于自家消费。

sentences.english: A: What sort of things do you grow in your garden?
sentences.chinese: 你在自家花园里都种些什么？

sentences.english: It launched its own e-reader software all of 12 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 12年前，它曾经推广过自家的电子阅读软件。

sentences.english: Not to be outdone, the Xu family to say the address.
sentences.chinese: 不甘示弱的徐某说出自家的地址。

sentences.english: Stephen is the snow to drink, eat their own species of rice and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 喝的是雪花泉，吃的是大米饭和自家种的青菜。

sentences.english: Google earns most of its money from sals sales of advertising on its search engine.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的盈利主要来自在自家搜索引擎上的销售广告。

sentences.english: Do u want your balcony full of papers, broken toys, and other rubbish?
sentences.chinese: 你想自家阳台上全是废纸，破玩具，和垃圾吗？

definition: household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to look after the house/(of skill, ability) special/outstanding
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
